tool.name: GetBetterLatestSatelliteImage
tool.summary: Search for images from an already created satellite field. For this sample, there is a limit of 6 months in the search.
tool.usage:
Select the satellite field from the list and then fill in the data filters. This tool has a timeframe restriction of 6 months. Remember the images can be limited by the date informed in the field creation as well.

After filling in the filters, the tool will show the available date images in a list and the image options for each date. The image type can be:

  • Multiband: a GeoTIFF with all bands available. It can vary depending on the provider.

  • NDRE: the calculated NDRE index. The values can vary from -1 to 1.

  • NDRE (colored): the NDRE index image with an applied symbology.

  • NDVI: the calculated NDVI index. The values can vary from -1 to 1.

  • NDVI (colored): the NDVI index image with an applied symbology.

  • RGB: the true color image, Red-Green-Blue composition.

  • Usable Data Mask (UDM): multiband image with masks, like cloud coverage, snow, and others. It is available only for Planet.

After selecting the date and image type, the execution will download the selected image. All images are downloaded locally as GeoTIFF.
